svg.title: Test: width:49%; height:auto; width="0" height="49%"
svg.desc: This testcase checks that the intrinsic height will be taken as the used height when the CSS 'height' property is set to 'auto', the 'width' property is set to some other value, and there is no intrinsic ratio. You should see a blue rectangle 49% wide and 49% high when viewing this file.
